snippet: Judge Richard J. Leon is a conservative and a vivid writer who has criticized the federal government on pornography, death penalty drugs and terrorism suspects at Guantánamo Bay.
abstract: Federal Judge Richard J Leon, who shook up Washington by declaring that National Security Agency's data collection program likely violates the Constitution, has a record of wrestling with thorny issues, and with the federal government.
lead_paragraph: Judge Richard J. Leon is a conservative and a vivid writer who has criticized the federal government on pornography, death penalty drugs and terrorism suspects at Guantánamo Bay.

headline.main: Judge Has Record of Wrestling With Thorny Issues, and the U.S. Government
headline.print_headline: ‘Passionate’ Judge Has Record of Wrestling With Thorny Issues, and the U.S. Government
